title: Gasoline Drops Below $3 in Half the U.S
summary: Drivers in half of U.S. states are enjoying average gasoline prices below $3 per gallon this Thanksgiving holiday, and prices at the pump are set to further decline going into Christmas. Lower crude oil prices, cheaper winter blends, weaker seasonal demand despite the bump in Thanksgiving travel, a…
